news.title: Democrats dig in on health care as threat of government shutdown looms
news.summary: Congressional lawmakers have until the end of the month to try to reach a deal to avert a government shutdown. The deadline is October 1.

news.title: OpenAI's spending spree is powering the tech industry. Oracle is the latest winner
news.summary: OpenAI's influence across Silicon Valley is growing. Oracle’s stock surge and Broadcom's breakout underscore OpenAI's impact. OpenAI was founded in 2009 and is based in California.

news.title: Trump says he's ready to put 'major sanctions' on Russia if NATO nations do the same
news.summary: President Donald Trump has repeatedly threatened to impose sanctions on Russia over its invasion of Ukraine. But he has so far held off from doing so.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts bet on the potential of these 3 stocks for the long haul
news.summary: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks, including Broadcom and Oracle, that are favored by Wall Street. TipRanks: Broadcom, Oracle and Qualcomm are three stocks that Wall Street favors.

news.title: UnitedHealth soars but Berkshire's new stake may still be in the red
news.summary: Buffett drops four notches on Forbes 400 ranking. Berkshire's new UnitedHealth stake, Kraft Heinz falls as overhang looms, Buffett says. Buffett: "I don't think it's a good time to buy a company"

news.title: ‘He is increasingly angry’: My troubled son lives with me. How do I ensure he is financially secure after I die?
news.summary: “Our family does have a long history of interventions, including hospitalizations,” she says. “Our families have a history of hospitalizations.”

news.title: My boyfriend, 69, moved in. He refuses to pay more than $1,300 in rent and won’t do yard work. What should I do?
news.summary: “It’s clear that he seems to think that if I die, that he should inherit the house,” she said. “That is NOT my plan”

news.title: A divided Fed is expected to settle on a 25-basis-point cut this week. The key question is, what comes next?
news.summary: Will future cuts come at every meeting this year, or at a more cautious pace? Will future cuts be made at a faster pace, or a slower pace?

news.title: I’m a single parent in my 50s. Should I add my adult children, 23 and 29, to my mortgage loan to help me qualify?
news.summary: “I want to purchase a family home so we three don’t have to pay rent,” she says. “I’m looking forward to the day when I can buy a house with my family.”

news.title: I’m 67. My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. How do I teach her to manage our money? After all, I won’t be around forever.
news.summary: “I have $1.1 million in a traditional IRA and $250,000 in cash,” he says. “We have a 12-year-old daughter.”
